name: Snake Tales
description:
SNAKES are amazing creatures in the world and they are scary due to their venomous bites. For few snake catchers Its amazingly fun to capture snakes and release snakes into wild jungles without hurting both snake and human. In this ultimate game a wizard snake catcher captures snakes and arrange them into irregular forms tiles. As a Junior wizard your job is to rearrange snakes and release them into wild jungles in a given time.

Popular Features are:
1. Amazing 45 levels
2. Three variants of snakes
3. Scoring based on stars
4. Integration with Game Centre to see your ranks

TIP for Junior Wizards:
Head and Tail end positions are fixed, arrange the rest of the tiles to release snake into wild jungles.

What to expect in next version:
1. More exciting 30 levels
2. Three more variants of snakes
3. Upgrade option from Junior Wizard to Master and Expert catchers
4. More themes to support jungles you like
5. Achievements
